items.title: AUTOSAR SWC Template
items.content: Use AI to generate boilerplate AUTOSAR software components with proper RTE interfaces

items.title: AI Code Review
items.content: Use `git diff | claude` for instant code reviews with domain expertise

items.title: RTOS Task Analysis
items.content: Use LLMs to analyze task priorities and deadlines in real-time systems

items.title: TypeScript Strict Mode
items.content: Enable strict mode early. Pain now = less bugs later
